content: options are given for several different thread weights requires between 1 and 2 balls each of white and a shaded color * size 10 crochet thread/size 5 pearl cotton #7 steel hook finished size approx 11-1/2 inches * silateen sansil article 102 #10 steel hook finished size approx 10-1/2 inches * size 30 crochet thread #12 steel hook finished size approx 9-1/2 inches * size 70 crochet/tatting thread #13 steel hook finished size approx 7-1/2 inches directions are given for basic doily #1 basic doily #2 and small doily with 3 1/2 center the basic doilies may also be used as centers for other borders such as grapes or holly leaves these patterns are provided elsewhere in the booklet
